title: Marvel Universe Iron Man (Digest)
description: All-ages action starring Iron Man! What terrible secret compels billionaire inventor Tony Stark to become the Golden Avenger? And what happens when Iron Man meets his Russian counterpart — the Titanium Man?! Plus: When the Mandarin seeks the key to immortality, Iron Man teams up with Spider-Man, Ant-Man and the Hulk to stop him! Iron Man and Nova must find a way to work together to defeat the Red Ghost and his Super-Apes! And Spymaster, Jolt, Plantman and Blacklash join forces to destroy Iron Man, in the most evil plan ever conceived by…Tony’s secretary, Pepper Potts?! Collecting MARVEL ADVENTURES IRON MAN #1, FREE COMIC BOOK DAY 2008 (MARVEL ADVENTURES), FREE COMIC BOOK DAY 2010 (IRON MAN: SUPERNOVA), IRON MAN: GOLDEN AVENGER #1 and material from FREE COMIC BOOK DAY 2007 (MARVEL ADVENTURES).
